attributes.action: Allow young adults in secondary schools to choose which theory of how the world began they are taught in science classes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think young adults in secondary schools should be able to choose which theory of creation they are taught. What's the use in knowing all about the theory of evolution if you don't believe a single word. I believe all teachings from world religions should be able to be taught to students in science if they have chosen to believe this was how things in the world were made.
